description:
Tsuna and his friends somehow make it back to Namimori Town with the Teleportation System. Not only has the system been damaged, but Byakuran and the real six Funeral Wreaths are merely being delayed, and they’ll be after Tsuna and the gang any moment. Until then, they have to find a way to protect Yuni and win against Byakuran. Tsuna and his friends rest for a bit to calm down. Reborn   explains what’s been going on in detail to Lal, who stayed at the Vongola base, and he insinuates that he has a secret plan to increase everyone’s power. It seems like Reborn isn’t the only one who’s in on this…
Source: crunchyroll
